abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: Fresh Off the Boat: Eddie Huang says Andy Ricker of Pok Pok, in Portland, Ore., will be taking over the original BaoHaus in a few weeks to serve up his famous Thai-style chicken wings. Mr. Ricker won Best Chef Northwest at the James Beard Awards this year. -- Nick Fox
